    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">在 VS Code 中，一键安装 MCP Server！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p data-first-child="" data-pid="162YFyVX">大家好！我是韩老师。</p>
<p data-pid="JlaOeyN3">本文是 MCP 系列文章的第三篇。之前的两篇文章是：</p>
<p data-pid="Rnax9kBP"><a class="internal" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/formulahendry/p/18787766" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043">Code Runner MCP Server，来了！</a></p>
<p data-pid="iBI-gHKN"><a class="internal" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/formulahendry/p/18792198" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043">从零开始开发一个 MCP Server！</a></p>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="CzHx__NX">经过之前两篇文章的介绍，相信不少童鞋已经用上甚至开发起了第一个 MCP Server。</p>
<p data-pid="ekDQcv5G">不过呢，还是遇到一些童鞋在安装/配置 MCP Server 的时候，遇到了一些问题。</p>
<p data-pid="UyN3vJd4">其实，现在不少 MCP Hosts/Clients 对于安装/配置 MCP Server，都是基于一个 JSON 的配置文件。且不说麻烦，也确实容易出错，不容易上手。</p>
<p data-pid="DQlDHXj4">不过呢，VS Code 就提供了一个非常方便的安装体验！MCP Server 开发者可以在网页上提供一个 Install 的按钮，让 end user 有一个一键安装的体验！</p>
<p data-pid="DrO29agL">今天，在 Code Runner MCP Server 的主页面上，韩老师就提供了这样的一键安装的按钮：</p>
<p data-pid="Lc2OAEno"><a class=" external" href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/formulahendry/mcp-server-code-runner%3Ftab%3Dreadme-ov-file%23npx-for-vs-code" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043"><span class="invisible">https://<span class="visible">github.com/formulahendr<span class="invisible">y/mcp-server-code-runner?tab=readme-ov-file#npx-for-vs-code</span></span></span></a></p>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<img src="https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1863b2bd334233c3f73013c6fa2fa7f6_1440w.jpg" width="1080" class="origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb" data-caption="" data-size="normal" data-rawwidth="1080" data-rawheight="391" data-original-token="v2-1863b2bd334233c3f73013c6fa2fa7f6" data-original="https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1863b2bd334233c3f73013c6fa2fa7f6_r.jpg">
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="T0Ts7Qm_">可以告别 JSON 配置文件啦！</p>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="47XGaSjW">那么，你也许会问，如果你也有一个 MCP Server 的话，应该如果创建这个按钮呢？</p>
<p data-pid="ooKIQ9kA">其实，很简单，分三步走。</p>
<p data-pid="D9aULg76">第一步，生成 MCP install 的 URL。</p>
<p data-pid="1d9erh28">以下是 Code Runner MCP Server 的例子，你可以把2到4行的代码换成你的 MCP Server 的启动配置：</p>
<div class="highlight">
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>const config =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> JSON.stringify({
    name: </span>'mcp-server-code-runner'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    command: </span>'npx'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    args: [</span>'-y', 'mcp-server-code-runner@latest'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]
});

const urlForWebsites </span>= `vscode-insiders:mcp/install?${encodeURIComponent(config)}`;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
const urlForGithub </span>= `https:<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">insiders.vscode.dev/redirect?url=${encodeURIComponent(urlForWebsites)}`;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
console.log(urlForGithub);</span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<p data-pid="uLpYcxKi">源代码：</p>
<p data-pid="584N7tFz"><a class=" external" href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/formulahendry/mcp-server-code-runner/blob/main/scripts/generateUrlForInstallation.js" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043"><span class="invisible">https://<span class="visible">github.com/formulahendr<span class="invisible">y/mcp-server-code-runner/blob/main/scripts/generateUrlForInstallation.js</span></span></span></a></p>
<p data-pid="LNJ0lAFi">第二步，生成 Static Badge</p>
<p data-pid="JQmZbNNf">到&nbsp;<a class=" external" href="https://shields.io/badges/static-badge" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="invisible">https://<span class="visible">shields.io/badges/stati<span class="invisible">c-badge</span></span></span></a>&nbsp;生成一个安装按钮的 badge。</p>
<p data-pid="Xhv_BvS8">比如：</p>
<p data-pid="clL6W-uU"><a class=" external" href="https://img.shields.io/badge/Install_MCP_Server-VS_Code_Insiders-24bfa5" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="invisible">https://<span class="visible">img.shields.io/badge/In<span class="invisible">stall_MCP_Server-VS_Code_Insiders-24bfa5</span></span></span></a></p>
<p data-pid="YnX0mBjc">第三步，合并出包含 URL 的 Markdown 按钮</p>
<p data-pid="oPa6T2e6">把第一步生成的 URL 和第二步生成的 Badge 进行合并：</p>
<div class="highlight">
<pre><code class="language-text">[![Install in VS Code Insiders](https://img.shields.io/badge/Install_MCP_Server-VS_Code_Insiders-24bfa5)](https://insiders.vscode.dev/redirect?url=vscode-insiders%3Amcp%2Finstall%3F%257B%2522name%2522%253A%2522mcp-server-code-runner%2522%252C%2522command%2522%253A%2522npx%2522%252C%2522args%2522%253A%255B%2522-y%2522%252C%2522mcp-server-code-runner%2540latest%2522%255D%257D)</code></pre>
</div>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="rQqlb4OM">大功告成啦！</p>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="hInPGLIZ">欢迎大家来试玩 Code Runner MCP Server：</p>
<p data-pid="cJBBHgyW"><a class=" external" href="https://github.com/formulahendry/mcp-server-code-runner" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="invisible">https://<span class="visible">github.com/formulahendr<span class="invisible">y/mcp-server-code-runner</span></span></span></a></p>
<p class="ztext-empty-paragraph">&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pid="Za-Ottfw">另外，之前的文章提到了可以用&nbsp;MCP Inspector&nbsp;来调试 MCP Server：</p>
<p data-pid="cnaY3ZVG"><a class=" wrap external" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/formulahendry/p/18792198" target="_blank" data-za-detail-view-id="1043">从零开始开发一款属于你的 MCP Server！五分钟搞定？</a></p>
<p data-pid="SGfjv-Fj">最近，我把&nbsp;Yoeman Generator&nbsp;for MCP Server 也进行了升级。</p>
<p data-pid="gPtZ0hTU">现在用 Yoeman Generator 创建新的 MCP Server 项目后，就可以直接在 VS Code 中按 F5 进行一键调试啦！</p>
